name: sefaria-mobile-e2e-tests
description: Cross-platform automated tests for Sefaria Mobile app

scripts.test:android: cross-env PLATFORM=android NODE_OPTIONS="--no-warnings --no-deprecation" mocha --require ts-node/register --extensions ts shared/tests/*.spec.ts --timeout 300000
scripts.test:ios: cross-env PLATFORM=ios NODE_OPTIONS="--no-warnings --no-deprecation" mocha --require ts-node/register --extensions ts shared/tests/*.spec.ts --timeout 300000
scripts.test:android:local: cross-env PLATFORM=android RUN_ENV=local NODE_OPTIONS="--no-warnings --no-deprecation" mocha --require ts-node/register --extensions ts shared/tests/*.spec.ts --timeout 300000
scripts.test:ios:local: cross-env PLATFORM=ios RUN_ENV=local NODE_OPTIONS="--no-warnings --no-deprecation" mocha --require ts-node/register --extensions ts shared/tests/*.spec.ts --timeout 300000
scripts.test:android:browserstack: cross-env PLATFORM=android RUN_ENV=browserstack NODE_OPTIONS="--no-warnings --no-deprecation" mocha --require ts-node/register --extensions ts shared/tests/*.spec.ts --timeout 300000
scripts.test:ios:browserstack: cross-env PLATFORM=ios RUN_ENV=browserstack NODE_OPTIONS="--no-warnings --no-deprecation" mocha --require ts-node/register --extensions ts shared/tests/*.spec.ts --timeout 300000
scripts.cleanup: npm run cleanup:android && npm run cleanup:ios
scripts.test:android:clean: npm run cleanup:android && npm run test:android:local
scripts.test:ios:clean: npm run cleanup:ios && npm run test:ios:local

author: Sefaria QA Team
